name: Car Insurance
description: Protect your vehicle with our comprehensive car insurance. We offer coverage for accidents, theft, and damage to ensure your peace of mind on the road.

name: Car Insurance Policy Hub
description: Take control of your car insurance paperwork with ease. The Car Insurance Policy Hub puts all your essential documents at your fingertips – accessible anytime, anywhere. Securely store, view and manage your policy details in one smart, streamlined place.

name: Health Insurance
description: Take control of your health with our tailored health insurance plans. From routine check-ups to specialised treatments, we ensure you and your family receive the best care when it matters most.

name: Temporary Motor Insurance
description: Get flexible, short-term cover with our temporary motor insurance. Perfect for borrowing a car, sharing a drive, or taking a road trip, our policies are designed to give you peace of mind without a long-term commitment.

name: Life Insurance
description: Secure your family's future with our life insurance plans. We offer flexible policies to suit your needs and ensure your loved ones are taken care of.

name: Over-50s Insurance
description: Guaranteed acceptance for UK residents aged 50 to 80. Over-50s life insurance helps leave a gift for loved ones or cover final expenses—with no medical required.

name: Income Protection
description: Protect your income if you're unable to work due to illness or injury. Our income protection plans provide monthly payouts to help you stay financially secure during recovery.

name: Critical Illness Insurance
description: Receive a tax-free lump sum if you're diagnosed with a serious illness. Our critical illness cover gives you the financial support you need to focus on getting better.

name: Health & Nutrition
description: Empower your well-being with our health and nutrition resources. Discover AI-powered nutrition advice, delicious recipes, and tools to help you achieve your fitness and dietary goals.

name: Wellbeing & Relaxation
description: Enhance your mindfulness practice with our collection of calming meditation sounds. Immerse yourself in soothing soundscapes to promote relaxation, focus, and inner peace.
